content.rendered:
THE TEAM

Meet the driving force behind Greenlight Films.

Les Nordhauser

Founder/ CEO / Executive Producer

Les is a producer with a strong Hollywood background and an active PGA member with over 30 years in the industry. He calls Thailand home and is an avid traveller.

Fon Paing

COO / Senior Producer

Fon is our production finance wizard and production conductor, choreographing our daily operations. While she tames budgets with finesse, it’s the allure of coffee that ignites her passion.

Kanda Chaisakornsamut

Production Coordinator

Kanda is a problem tackler, a multitasker and a learner at heart with a passion in organizing and finding perfect solution for filmmakers. She loves animals as much as watching drama films at night.

Nan Yee Aye (Gina)

Production Associate

Gina is a veteran of many productions. She's like a chameleon. She can adapt to all your needs. She is adventurous in both travels and food.

Pat Promtu

Government Liaison

Pat is our film permit guru. Her multitasking skills are top-noch. When she’s not buried deep in paperwork, her side hustle is organizing dance parties.

Mushi

Security (if it’s not raining)

Mushi is our special staff. She works as our security but only when it's not raining.

Les Nordhauser

Founder/ CEO / Executive Producer

Les is a producer with a strong Hollywood background and an active PGA member with over 30 years in the industry. He calls Thailand home and is an avid traveller.

Fon Paing

COO / Senior Producer

Fon is our production finance wizard and production conductor, choreographing our daily operations. While she tames budgets with finesse, it’s the allure of coffee that ignites her passion.

Tahn (Nut) Tahntawan

Associate Producer/ Film & TV Development

Nut has experience with film festivals and film & TV production. She takes pride in supporting filmmakers and build a sustainable and inspiring community of filmmakers in Southeast Asia.

Absone Oriabel Mesnil

Associate Producer/ Director/ Commercials

Absone produces, writes, directs and acts. An up-and-coming young talent to keep an eye on. Born and raised in Bangkok, with a French twist.

Pat Promtu

Government Liaison

Pat is our film permit guru. Her multitasking skills are top-noch. When she’s not buried deep in paperwork, her side hustle is organizing dance parties.

Mushi

Security (if it’s not raining)

Mushi is our special staff. She works as our security but only when it's not raining.
